entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, York Factory
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
